amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to increase the salaries or basic pay of foreign service officers in fiscal year 2011.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 583 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in H.R. 1 to be used to change any rate of salary or basic pay pursuant to section 1113 of Public Law 111-32.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A122) Agreed to by voice vote.
